troops.description: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.
A pair of unarmored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair advice.
Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!
A lumbering giant that explodes when destroyed, dealing high damage to nearby enemies. When you get tired of being called bone-head all the time, this is the way to go!
A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip but packs a huge punch.
The arena is a certified butterfly sanctuary. No, wait. It's a Pancake Demolition Factory!
Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.
The most awesome man to ever set foot in the arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.
Flying troop that deals area damage. Baby Dragon isn't so cute when he's barbecuing your whole army.
Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.
A warrior with luxurious hair and outstanding flexibility. Demonstrates his aerobics skills on demand.

champion_ability.name: Dash Forward
champion_ability.description: Dashes forward damaging all enemies in path

troops.description: The Archer Queen is a strong ranged unit and deals area damage. Her ability calls in a squad of Archers for support.

champion_ability.name: Royal Cloak
champion_ability.description: Becomes invisible and summons a squad of Archers

troops.description: The Skeleton King is a melee fighter that summons an army of Skeletons when defeated. Even the royalty is into fitness these days.

champion_ability.name: Soul Storm
champion_ability.description: Summons an army of Skeletons around him

troops.description: A pint-sized Champion who rides around on his trusty Guardian! The Guardian can tank damage while the Little Prince shoots from above.

champion_ability.name: Guardian Leap
champion_ability.description: The Guardian jumps forward, dealing area damage

troops.description: A master of inner peace and the Flying Kick. His ability deflects enemy projectiles!

champion_ability.name: Pensive Protection
champion_ability.description: Deflects enemy projectiles back at them

troops.description: This furious fighter gets angrier the more he's hurt. When his health drops below 50%, his damage and speed increase!
A mystical flying unit that can transform between air and ground forms. She deals area damage and has extended range.
Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of 'Hog Riderrrrr' all the way through the arena doors.
Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swinging that battle axe in a circle, she can wipe out a pile of enemies!
Slow but durable, the Giant loves to soak up damage while your smaller troops attack.
A flying unit that targets buildings and deals massive death damage. Even when destroyed, it still packs a punch!
The Boss Bandit is a tough Champion who charges at enemies and can steal elixir from opponents.

champion_ability.name: Elixir Steal
champion_ability.description: Steals elixir from the opponent on next hit

troops.description: A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.
Three ranged attackers. Throw spears at enemies from a distance. Increased range after August 2025 balance changes.
Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, Minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!
Small, lightly protected warrior who throws bombs. Deals area damage that can wipe out a swarm of enemies.
Fifteen Skeletons form an army. They can quickly surround and destroy high hitpoint enemies.
Summons Skeletons, shoots destructive skulls from the sky and has glorious flowing hair. When she's destroyed, she damages and slows nearby enemies!
Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Excellent at distracting enemy troops and one-cycling your deck.
Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explodes and splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!
The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. When destroyed, it splits into many smaller, weaker Lava Pups.
This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a warm heart.
This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.
The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his astonishingly handsome hair flow freely in the wind. He fits in perfectly with the Prince in friendly battles.
The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.
Sparky slowly charges up, then unloads MASSIVE area damage. Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.
This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks. His massive boulders roll through their target, hitting everything behind for reduced damage.
He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night. His bottle of Rage spills everywhere when he's defeated.
Shoots a focused beam that increases in damage over time. Wears a little hat because he's a classy dragon.
He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Balances out the Elixir Collector in a neat way.
Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.
Spawns two fast, armored Barbarians with fierce mustaches and even fiercer tempers.
Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. The shields make them tough, but they're still just skeletons!
Three Fire Spirits that deal area damage. Even when outnumbered, Fire Spirits pack a punch.
Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespect them at your own peril.
Destroying enemy buildings with his massive cannon is his job; making a raggedy beard look good is his passion.
The Electro Wizard arrives with a zap! Attacks hit up to two enemies and briefly stuns them.
The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched.
Summons Bats to do her bidding! When defeated, she uses her last breath to summon a final batch of Bats.
Four fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, bats are purple, you defeated me, but don't celebrate early!
He's full of life! Heal Spirit will jump at the nearest ally and heal all friendly troops and buildings around his target.
A chill little dude that freezes enemies. Despite his frigid personality, he's a warm companion.
A spunky little fella that jumps at enemies and gives them a shock! Does not judge. You can equip any hairstyle.
Mother Witch creates Cursed Hogs from enemy troops. Don't mess with her, or you'll get hogging mad!
Attacks hit up to three units and briefly stuns them. Don't ask him to assist with the sparky.
A majestic flying creature that turns into an egg when defeated. The egg then hatches into a Phoenix once more!
The Mighty Miner burrows underground and emerges to devastate enemies. His drill can really get under your skin!

champion_ability.name: Explosive Escape
champion_ability.description: Burrows underground and explodes at target location

troops.description: Two flying skeletons that shoot homing projectiles. They're sort of cute, but also sort of creepy.
A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers who deal area damage around their target. They're prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice!
She shoots a firework that explodes on the first enemy it hits, dealing area damage. The firework knocks her back out of harm's way!
A fearsome fighter from the frozen wastes who rides a big, bad battle ram that can knock out enemy buildings!
A massive stone giant covered in magical runes. Each rune provides protection and when destroyed, the giant becomes more powerful!
A mechanical goblin contraption that shoots fireballs. When destroyed, spawns a Goblin Builder who repairs it!
Throws bombs at buildings from long range. He's here to demolish!
A monstrous creation that spawns smaller monsters when defeated. It's alive!
Looks like a harmless bush, but three Goblins jump out when enemies get close!
It's a Skeleton Barrel. What more do you want? It's a barrel, and the Skeletons are in it... until it lands.
Two Barbarians holding a log charge at the nearest building. When the Ram is destroyed, the Barbarians are released and keep fighting!
He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing area damage. Stand aside!
He deals BIG damage up close, less damage at range. He's not compensating for anything, his gun is just really good.
Barely keeps himself off the ground. Shoots a single high-damage projectile at a time. His ragdoll physics are great!
Three Zappies spawn. They permanently stun their target as long as at least one of them is alive. How cute!
The King's personal pets are loose! They love eating everything in sight... especially buildings.
Deploys a line of recruits with shields. They're one-time recruits, so they'll need to make it count!
Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears. It's a Goblin Gang! Do they stand a chance against you and your Arena Tower? Hmmm...
The boy attacks from melee range, while the girls pelt their targets from a distance. The girls are, of course, the boss of this operation.
Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!
Drilling into the enemy side of the Arena, spawning Goblins that will attack nearby enemy troops and buildings. Drill, baby, drill!
He has a shield, and Spear Goblins sitting on his shoulders. What could be cooler?
A cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a cannon not on wheels.
He hooks the heaviest enemy troop and pulls it to him! It's always the big one that gets away.
Tanky, top-heavy troop that gives your opponent Elixir when destroyed! Carries an explosive surprise for his last breath.
Heals friendly troops with her aura. Doctors HATE her! If you get it... if you don't, ask your mom.
Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum. How does he blow bubbles through his hood?
He throws his axe like a boomerang, striking all enemies on the way out AND back. It's a miracle he doesn't hurt himself.
He shoots magic arrows that pierce and damage whatever they hit. He's a mystical ace of projectiles!
He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Spooky.
